channel.title: Migrate2vcsa on Emad Younis

item.title: Printing #migrate2vcsa Stickers and Apparel
item.description:
[Updated to include more VCSA and VMware Cloud on AWS Stickers]

Happy New Year! 2016 was a big year for the vCenter Server Appliance (VCSA). We now have officially supported Migration Tools in vSphere 6.0 U2m and vSphere 6.5. With the release of vSphere 6.5, the VCSA has surpassed its Windows counterpart in terms of features and performance. Then there was the hot swag that debuted at both VMworld US and Barcelona, in the form of stickers and shirts. Yes, there were hoodies too ðŸ™‚
